verses.verse: These are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, all the <S%H3117>days<s%> that ye <S%H2416>live<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H6>utterly<s%> <S%H6>destroy<s%> all the <S%H4725>places<s%>, wherein the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>, upon the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and upon the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>:

And ye shall <S%H5422>overthrow<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H7665>break<s%> their <S%H4676>pillars<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>; and ye shall hew <S%H1438>down<s%> the graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of them out of that <S%H4725>place<s%>.
Ye shall not do <S%H6213>so<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

But unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> out of all your <S%H7626>tribes<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> there, even unto his <S%H7933>habitation<s%> shall ye <S%H1875>seek<s%>, and thither thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%>:

And thither ye shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and your <S%H4643>tithes<s%>, and heave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and your <S%H5088>vows<s%>, and your freewill <S%H5071>offerings<s%>, and the <S%H1062>firstlings<s%> of your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flocks<s%>:

And there ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and ye shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in all that ye <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto, ye and your <S%H1004>households<s%>, wherein the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee.
Ye shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> after all the things that we <S%H6213>do<s%> here this <S%H3117>day<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> whatsoever is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
For ye are not as yet <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4496>rest<s%> and to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you.

But when ye go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> giveth you to <S%H5157>inherit<s%>, and when he giveth you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, so that ye <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>;

Then there shall be a <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> there; thither shall ye <S%H935>bring<s%> all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you; your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, your <S%H4643>tithes<s%>, and the heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and all your <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%> which ye <S%H5087>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>:

And ye shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, ye, and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and your <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and your <S%H519>maidservants<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is within your <S%H8179>gates<s%>; <S%H3588>forasmuch<s%> as he hath no <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you.
Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself that thou <S%H5927>offer<s%> not thy burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> in every <S%H4725>place<s%> that thou <S%H7200>seest<s%>:

But in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of thy <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, there thou shalt <S%H5927>offer<s%> thy burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and there thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee.

Notwithstanding thou mayest <S%H2076>kill<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in all thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, whatsoever thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusteth <S%H185>after<s%>, according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> which he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee: the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, as of the <S%H6643>roebuck<s%>, and as of the <S%H354>hart<s%>.
Only ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%>; ye shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> it upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>.

¶ Thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of thy <S%H1715>corn<s%>, or of thy <S%H8492>wine<s%>, or of thy <S%H3323>oil<s%>, or the <S%H1062>firstlings<s%> of thy <S%H1241>herds<s%> or of thy <S%H6629>flock<s%>, nor any of thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> which thou <S%H5087>vowest<s%>, nor thy freewill <S%H5071>offerings<s%>, or heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>:

But thou must <S%H398>eat<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>, thou, and thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, and thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and thy <S%H5650>manservant<s%>, and thy <S%H519>maidservant<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in all that thou <S%H4916>puttest<s%> thine <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto.
Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself that thou <S%H5800>forsake<s%> not the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> as long as thou <S%H3117>livest<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

¶ When the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> thy <S%H1366>border<s%>, as he hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, I will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, because thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>longeth<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; thou mayest <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, whatsoever thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusteth <S%H185>after<s%>.

If the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> there be too <S%H7368>far<s%> from thee, then thou shalt <S%H2076>kill<s%> of thy <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of thy <S%H6629>flock<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee, as I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> in thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> whatsoever thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusteth <S%H185>after<s%>.

Even as the <S%H6643>roebuck<s%> and the <S%H354>hart<s%> is <S%H398>eaten<s%>, so thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> them: the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of them <S%H3162>alike<s%>.

Only be <S%H2388>sure<s%> that thou <S%H398>eat<s%> not the <S%H1818>blood<s%>: for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is the <S%H5315>life<s%>; and thou mayest not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> with the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H398>eat<s%> it; thou shalt <S%H8210>pour<s%> it upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H398>eat<s%> it; that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and with thy <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee, when thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Only thy holy <S%H6944>things<s%> which thou hast, and thy <S%H5088>vows<s%>, thou shalt <S%H5375>take<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> thy burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be poured <S%H8210>out<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

<S%H8104>Observe<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee, that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and with thy <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, when thou <S%H6213>doest<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ When the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> them, and thou <S%H3423>succeedest<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%>;

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself that thou be not <S%H5367>snared<s%> by <S%H310>following<s%> them, <S%H310>after<s%> that they be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; and that thou <S%H1875>inquire<s%> not after their <S%H430>gods<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, How did these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>? even so will I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H6213>do<s%> so unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: for every <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which he <S%H8130>hateth<s%>, have they <S%H6213>done<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods<s%>; for even their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> they have <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> to their <S%H430>gods<s%>.
What <S%H1697>thing<s%> soever I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it: thou shalt not <S%H3254>add<s%> thereto, nor <S%H1639>diminish<s%> from it.
